newsitem.title: UK: LIFFE coffee off lows, cocoa down, sugar shines.
newsitem.headline: LIFFE coffee off lows, cocoa down, sugar shines.

text.p: COFFEE - Bounces from six-month lows as origin, fund sales dry up but fails to wipe out losses. Sept regains $1,505 foothold, ends $42 down at $1,505.

COCOA - Continued fund selling pushes Sept to new intraday low at 968 stg, lowest since March 10. Finishes 10 down at 975 stg. SUGAR - Persistent fund buying drives Oct close to new contract high. Up $4.40 at $329.10 by 1608 GMT.
